title: Account Hacked, Ticket Denied
body: My account TSMshouldscoutme has been hacked and password/email changed. I submitted a ticket and entered the info needed. I then got a reply that requested more info, I gave that info and then was denied back my account saying the info I entered was incorrect. I know the info I entered was correct and the old Email that I created the account with no longer exist. I even submitted my IP so you can trace back and compare that they are the same IP. I have had this account since 2010 and would be very upset to lose it after getting hacked once.

replies.body: Our account team takes great measure to make sure an account is returned to the owner, without a shadow of a doubt.  If you were denied, it's okay just try again through our [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  Best of luck!
I made a ticket on the account recovery form and never got a reply.
I also dont unerstand how someone was able to get my account info, then change my password on the account when the email linked to the account no longer exist.
Did you log into one of those free rp events that was getting spread on facebook?
